FermAT.TrialIdentifier module¶

class FermAT.TrialIdentifier.TrialIdentifier(strain_id='', id_1='', id_2='', id_3='', replicate_id=None, time=-1, analyte_name='None', analyte_type='None')¶

Bases: object

Carries information about the run through all the objects

Attributes

strain_id (str) Strain name e.g. ‘MG1655 del(adh,pta)’
id_1 (str, optional) First identifier, plasmid e.g. ‘pTrc99a’
id_2 (str, optional) Second identifier, inducer e.g. ‘IPTG’
replicate_id (str) The replicate number, e.g. ‘1’,‘2’,‘3’,‘4’
time (float) The time of the data point, only relevant in TimePoint objects
analyte_name (str) The name of the titer, e.g. ‘OD600’,’Lactate’,’Ethanol’,’Glucose’
titerType (str) The type of titer, three acceptable values e.g. ‘biomass’,’substrate’,’product’

Methods

get_unique_for_SingleTrial()
get_unique_id_for_ReplicateTrial() Get the unique information for a single replicate_id Returns ——- unique_id : str Unique id defining a replicate_id.
parse_trial_identifier_from_csv(...) Used to parse a CSV trial_identifier
summary(items)

Used to parse a CSV trial_identifier

Parameters:

csv_trial_identifier : str

a comma-separated string containing a TrialIdentifier in standard form - strain_id,id_1,id_2,replicate_id
